name: Classic Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil the pasta according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, chop onion and garlic.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add chopped tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes to create a sauce.
Drain the pasta and mix it with the sauce. Serve hot.

name: Simple Chicken Salad
instructions: Chop the cooked chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.
Combine all chopped ingredients in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and lemon juice for the dressing.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.

name: Scrambled Eggs on Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Whisk eggs and milk together in a bowl.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook, stirring gently, until they are soft and cooked through.
Serve the scrambled eggs on top of the toast.

name: Hearty Lentil Soup
instructions: Finely chop carrot, celery, onion, and garlic.
In a large pot, sauté the chopped vegetables until soft.
Rinse the lentils and add them to the pot.
Pour in the vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions.
Slice chicken and vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
In a wok or large pan, stir-fry the chicken until cooked through.
Add broccoli and bell pepper, and cook for another 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce, stir to combine, and serve over rice.

name: Classic Beef Tacos
instructions: In a skillet, cook ground beef until browned. Drain fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and a little water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas according to package directions.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Simple Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine vegetables in a bowl.
Crumble feta cheese over the top.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss gently.

name: Cheesy Quesadilla
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Place one tortilla in the skillet.
Sprinkle cheese and chicken over the tortilla.
Top with the second tortilla and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown and cheese is melted.

name: Lemon Herb Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil, juice from half the lemon, and sprinkle with dill.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve with remaining lemon wedges.

name: Black Bean Burgers
instructions: Rinse and drain black beans, then mash them in a bowl.
Mix in bread crumbs, onion, and egg until a patty can be formed.
Form into patties and cook in a lightly oiled pan for 5 minutes per side.
Serve on burger buns with your favorite toppings.

name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
In a skillet, sauté garlic and mushrooms in butter or oil.
Reduce heat and stir in heavy cream and parmesan cheese.
Simmer until the sauce thickens slightly.
Drain pasta and toss with the creamy mushroom sauce.

name: Oatmeal with Berries
instructions: Combine oats and water in a small saucepan.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour into a bowl and top with fresh berries and a drizzle of honey.

name: Simple Guacamole
instructions: Mash the avocados in a bowl.
Squeeze in the juice from the lime.
Stir in the chopped red onion and cilantro.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with chips.

name: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Peel and boil potatoes until tender. Mash with milk and butter.
In a separate pan, brown the ground beef with chopped onion and carrot. Drain fat.
Stir in beef broth and simmer until thickened.
Spread the beef mixture in a baking dish and top with the mashed potatoes.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes until golden brown.

name: Classic Tuna Sandwich
instructions: Drain the canned tuna and place it in a bowl.
Mix in mayonnaise and chopped celery.
Spread the tuna salad mixture onto one slice of bread.
Top with the other slice of bread.

name: Garlic Roasted Broccoli
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Cut broccoli into florets and toss with olive oil and minced garlic.
Spread on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast for 15-20 minutes, until tender and slightly browned.

name: Simple Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and sugar.
In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or pan and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions.
Sauté chopped onion and garlic in a pan until soft.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the chickpeas and coconut milk, bring to a simmer, and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve the curry over rice.

name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: Simple Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a large skillet or wok, then set aside.
Add peas and carrots to the skillet and cook until tender.
Add the cooked rice to the skillet and break it up.
Stir in the soy sauce and the scrambled eggs.
Cook, stirring constantly, until everything is heated through.
